english.segment1: Pour out your water. That I might take a sip. Your love consumes me. Every drip. It is like Honey. On my lips. Pour out your water. That I might take a sip
english.segment2: Your words. are a lamp unto my feet. when I walk down these. Dark and Lonely streets. You are all I need
english.segment3: Pour out your mercy. and clear this busy mind. your love is like eden. a slice of apple pie. It is like sugar on my toung. So pour out your mercy. clear my busy mind
english.segment4: Your words. are a lamp unto my feet. when I walk down these. Dark and Lonely streets. You are all I need
